          <title>
            <string language="hu">Szent Edward király élete.</string>
            <string language="en">The life of King Saint Edward</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Leben des Königs Heiliges Edward</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vie du Roi Saint Edouard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A vida do rei Saint Edward</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La vita del re San Edward</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ζωή του βασιλιά Αγιος Edward</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La vida de rey Santo Edward</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">lovas csataábrázolás.</string>
            <string language="en">equestrian battle representation</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">angol,  Szent Edward király,  normann,  miniátor,  iniciálé,  Hódító Vilmos,  Hitvalló Edward,  II. Harald,  fegyverzet,  </string>
            <string language="en">English, King Saint Edward, Norman, miniaturist, initial, William the Conqueror, Edward the Confessor, Harald II., weaponry</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reiterschlachtdarstellung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">représentation équestre de bataille</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">respresentação equestrian da batalha</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rappresentazione equestrian di battaglia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιππική αντιπροσώπευση μάχης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">representación ecuestre de la batalla</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch, König Heiliges Edward, Normanne, 
miniaturist, Initiale, William der Eroberer, Edward der Beichtvater, 
Harald II., Kampfmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'anglais, le Roi Saint Edouard, Normand, 
miniaturist, initiale, William le conquérant, Edouard le 
confesseur, Harald II., armements</string>
          </keyword>

inicial, William o conqueror, Edward o confessor, Harald II.,

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά, βασιλιάς Αγιος Edward, Norman, miniaturist,
αρχικό, William ο κατακτητής, Edward ο ομολογητής, Harald 
ΙΙ., εξοπλισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

inicial, Guillermo el conqueror, Edward el Confesor, Harald II.,
